pages.title: Blast-Proof plates
pages.text: Tired of Creepers blowing holes in your walls? The Blast-Proof Plates are an cheap and excellent way to stop those pesky creepers from ruining your day.

pages.title: Cannon
pages.text: Some say the best defence is offense. The Cannon is like a mini-TNT cannot without the risk of blowing up. Fuel with gunpowder, supply with Cannon Balls, and fire away.

pages.title: Ballista
pages.text: When powered with a redstone signal, Ballistas will fire supplied arrows automatically at any nearby hostile mobs. Mobs may attack Ballistas and are even able to break them entirely.
